title: Who is Vinny in Emmerdale and is he Mandy’s son?
text:
Vinny has been hiding something from the Dingles (Picture: ITV)

Tonight’s episode of Emmerdale will see two big secrets revealed as Dingle Court is called into session and Mandy (Lisa Riley) is made to answer to her family for her recent bout of mischief.

She and Vinny (Bradley Johnson) will try their best to avoid their family, after attempting to steal Lydia’s (Karen Blick) money, but the pair will be dragged back to the village and will have to face Dingle justice for the would-be crime.

At first, Mandy will resist, but eventually, she’ll give in and confess the truth…

Is Vinny Mandy’s son on Emmerdale?

We can’t reveal whether or not Vinny is really Mandy’s son, as we’ve been led to believe, but in upcoming scenes, Mandy will confess that both she and Vinny were running a card counting scam in a number of Terry’s casinos.

On top of that, as Mandy shares the motives for her misdeeds, it will become clear that Charity (Emma Atkins) knew more about what was going on than she led everyone to believe.

As if that wasn’t enough drama for one evening, Vinny has a secret of his own which will be coming out in scenes tonight.

So what exactly is the secret that young Vinny is so scared will be revealed? Only time will tell…

Emmerdale continues Tuesday 29 October at 7pm on ITV.
